column2: Nova School of Business and Economics
column5: What are you waiting for? An international career is expecting you.This Master’s is designed for those high achievers who seek to brave the globe and dive into the realm of finance. Are you ready to perform higher than most? Students graduating from this Master's typically pursue an international career in multinational organizations in the financial area.ProgramThe International Master’s in Finance is directed to Bachelor's students who want to have an international career after their Master’s program and ambition a fast career progression in the financial area.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
